definition: tonnage/class in tons (of a passenger ship)

pinyin: qian1 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4
bai3 wan4 dun1 ji2 he2 wu3 qi4

sentences.english: Coal reserves of 27 million tons above, mercury for heavy deposit.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭儲量2700萬噸以上，汞爲萬噸級特大礦牀。

sentences.english: All the main rapid reaches cannot meet the navigation expectation of ten-thousand-tonnage fleet.
sentences.chinese: 各主要灘段均不能滿足萬噸級船隊的通航要求。

sentences.english: The ship lock ranks Grade III and has the navigation standard of four kiloton ship in one uplifting.
sentences.chinese: 船閘爲Ⅲ級，通航標準爲一頂四艘千噸級。

sentences.english: Any vessel with draft more than 13 meters can anchor at "100,000 DWT Anchorage".
sentences.chinese: 喫水大於13米的船舶可在“十萬噸級錨地”錨泊。

sentences.english: Well. Eight-tonne capacity truck crane must be preferred. It travels faster.
sentences.chinese: 那麼，八噸級的汽車起重機較好，它跑的快些。

sentences.english: What about actual productivity measured in ton-miles?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是實際生產力衡量噸級哩呢？

sentences.english: I know that nuclear bombs are measured in terms of megatons.
sentences.chinese: 我知道原子彈以百萬噸級計。

sentences.english: This harbor is able to take in large cargo-vessels of 10,000 ton's capacity.
sentences.chinese: 這個港口也能容納萬噸級貨輪作業了。
